external_games.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog MP077

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Break the Fog MP077
summary: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Break The Fog is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. This DLC includes map pack 077.
